Title: Provides that a voter may register to vote at any residence to which the voter maintains a continuous connection with an intent to remain
Summary: Provides that a voter may register to vote at any residence to which the voter maintains a continuous connection with an intent to return, including a second home or a vacation home or a home where a student lives while attending a college or university.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to providing that a voter may register to vote at any residence to which the voter maintains a continuous connection with an intent to remain
